mapper.select: SELECT S.SONG_NAME AS songName, AR.ARTIST_NAME AS artistName, S.PLAYTIME AS playTime, COUNT(*) OVER () AS dataCount FROM SONG S, ARTIST AR, MEMBER M, PLAYLIST_NOW PN, PLAYLIST_NOW_SONG PNS WHERE S.ARTIST_ID = AR.ARTIST_ID AND M.MEMBER_ID = PN.MEMBER_ID AND PN.PLAYLIST_CD = PNS.PLAYLIST_CD AND PNS.SONG_ID = S.SONG_ID AND M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY ADD_TIME ASC
SELECT PLAYLIST_CD AS playlistCd FROM PLAYLIST_NOW WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLAYLIST_NOW_SONG( PLAYLIST_CD, SONG_ID, ADD_TIME ) VALUES (#{playlistCd},#{songId}, sysdate)
